Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.locale.message

Class Message

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.locale.message.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalizedMessage
public sealed class Message extends Object permits LocalizedMessage
A message that can be formatted with replacements and localized.

    • of

      @Contract(value="_, _ -> new", pure=true) public static LocalizedMessage of(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.locales.MessageKeyProvider messageKeyProvider, @NotNull @NotNull MessageReplacement... replacements)
      Creates a localized Message with the given message key provider and replacements.
      This message will extend MessageKeyProvider and delegate to the given message key provider.
      Parameters:
      messageKeyProvider - The message key provider
      replacements - The replacements
      Returns:
      A new localizable Message

    • of

      @Contract(value="_, _, _ -> new", pure=true) public static LocalizedMessage of(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.locales.MessageKeyProvider messageKeyProvider, @NotNull @NotNull String nonLocalizedMessage, @NotNull @NotNull MessageReplacement... replacements)
      Creates a localized Message with the given message key provider, non-localized message and replacements.
      The non-localized message is required for conditions where it is not practical to provide a localized message.
      This message will extend MessageKeyProvider and delegate to the given message key provider.
      Parameters:
      messageKeyProvider - The message key provider
      nonLocalizedMessage - The non-localized message
      replacements - The replacements
      Returns:
      A new localizable Message

    • getReplacements

      @NotNull public @NotNull String[] getReplacements()
      Gets the replacements for this message.
      This array is guaranteed to be of even length and suitable for use with ACFUtil.replaceStrings(String, String...).
      Returns:
      The replacements

    • getReplacements

      @NotNull public @NotNull String[] getReplacements(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.commands.Locales locales, @Nullable @Nullable co.aikar.commands.CommandIssuer commandIssuer)
      Gets the replacements for this message with localization support.
      This array is guaranteed to be of even length and suitable for use with ACFUtil.replaceStrings(String, String...).
      Parameters:
      locales - The MultiverseCore locales provider
      commandIssuer - The command issuer the message is for, or null for the console (default locale)
      Returns:
      The replacements

      Gets the raw, non-localized, non-replaced message.
      Returns:
      The raw message

    • formatted

      @NotNull public @NotNull String formatted()
      Gets the formatted message.
      This is the raw, non-localized message with replacements applied.
      Returns:
      The formatted message

    • formatted

      @NotNull public @NotNull String formatted(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.commands.Locales locales)
      Gets the formatted message from localization data.
      This is the localized message with replacements applied. The message is localized using the default locale.
      Parameters:
      locales - The MultiverseCore locales provider
      Returns:
      The formatted, localized message

    • formatted

      @NotNull public @NotNull String formatted(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.commands.CommandIssuer commandIssuer)
      Gets the formatted message from localization data.
      This is the localized message with replacements applied. The message is localized using the locale of the given command issuer, if not null.
      Parameters:
      commandIssuer - The command issuer the message is for, or null for the console (default locale)
      Returns:
      The formatted, localized message

    • formatted

      @NotNull public @NotNull String formatted(@NotNull @NotNull co.aikar.commands.Locales locales, @Nullable @Nullable co.aikar.commands.CommandIssuer commandIssuer)
      Gets the formatted message from localization data.
      This is the localized message with replacements applied. The message is localized using the locale of the given command issuer, if not null.
      Parameters:
      locales - The MultiverseCore locales provider
      commandIssuer - The command issuer the message is for, or null for the console (default locale)
      Returns:
      The formatted, localized message
